section.8: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Witr

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah said:By Allah, I shall offer prayer like that of the Messenger of Allah (ï·º). The narrator said: Abu Hurairah used to recite the supplication in the last rak'ah of the noon, night and dawn prayers. He would supplicate for the believers and curse the disbelievers
